mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_CHK_R_DETAIL_LAND (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
ass_chk_no ,
ass_card_no ,
price ,
add_depre ,
add_manage_depre ,
cur_money ,
fore_money ,
note ,
) VALUES (
#{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_chk_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{price,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{add_depre,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{add_manage_depre,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{cur_money,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{fore_money,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
)
mapper.select: SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, ass_chk_no, ass_card_no, price, add_depre, add_manage_depre, cur_money, fore_money, note FROM ass_chk_r_detail_land WHERE group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ass_chk_no = #{ass_chk_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, ass_chk_no, ass_card_no, price, add_depre, add_manage_depre, cur_money, fore_money, note FROM ass_chk_r_detail_land WHERE group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ass_chk_no = #{ass_chk_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t6.check_no,t6.check_plan_no,t1.ass_card_no,t1.ass_id,t1.pl_amount,t5.price,t5.fore_money,t5.cur_money,t5.manage_depre_money add_manage_depre,t5.depre_money add_depre,t1.group_id,t1.hos_id,t1.copy_code from ASS_CHECK_DETAIL_LAND t1 left join ass_no_dict t2 on t1.group_id = t2.group_id and t1.hos_id = t2.hos_id and t1.copy_code = t2.copy_code and t1.ass_id = t2.ass_id and t1.ass_no = t2.ass_no and t2.is_stop = 0 left join ass_type_dict t3 on t3.group_id = t2.group_id and t3.hos_id = t2.hos_id and t3.copy_code = t2.copy_code and t3.ass_type_id = t2.ass_type_id and t3.is_last = 1 and t3.is_stop = 0 left join ass_card_LAND t5 on t1.group_id = t5.group_id and t1.hos_id = t5.hos_id and t1.copy_code = t5.copy_code and t1.ass_card_no = t5.ass_card_no left join ASS_CHECK_LAND t6 on t1.check_no = t6.check_no and t1.check_plan_no = t6.check_plan_no where
t1.hos_id = #{item.hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
t1.check_no = #{item.check_no,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
t1.group_id =#{item.group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
t1.copy_code =#{item.copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
t1.ass_id = #{item.ass_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
t1.ass_no = #{item.ass_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
t1.ass_card_no = #{item.ass_card_no,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
t1.pl_amount < 0 and
t1.check_plan_no =#{item.check_plan_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
